---
title: 'eth_getTransactionReceipt'
openapi: 'POST /json-rpc'
playground: 'interactive'
---
### Parameters

Parameters for eth_getTransactionByHash: [transactionHash].

- `params[0]` (string): 32 Bytes - Hash of the transaction.

### Returns

<ResponseField body='result' type='oneOf'>
  Receipt object returned after transaction execution. Can be a legacy receipt (pre-EIP-2718) or AccessList receipt (EIP-2930).
</ResponseField>

<RequestExample>

```bash Curl
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.uniblock.dev/uni/v1/json-rpc?chainId=97 \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "id": 1,
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt",
    "params": [
      "0x444172bef57ad978655171a8af2cfd89baa02a97fcb773067aef7794d6913374"
    ]
  }'
```

```json JSON-RPC
{
  "id": 1,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt",
  "params": [
    "0x444172bef57ad978655171a8af2cfd89baa02a97fcb773067aef7794d6913374"
  ]
}
```

</RequestExample>
<ResponseExample>

```json Success
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": {
    "blockHash": "0x67c0303244ae4beeec329e0c66198e8db8938a94d15a366c7514626528abfc8c",
    "blockNumber": "0x6914b0",
    "contractAddress": "0x471a8bf3fd0dfbe20658a97155388cec674190bf",
    "from": "0xc931d93e97ab07fe42d923478ba2465f2",
    "to": null,
    "cumulativeGasUsed": "0x158e33",
    "gasUsed": "0xba2e6",
    "logs": [],
    "logsBloom": "",
    "status": "0x1",
    "transactionHash": "0x444172bef57ad978655171a8af2cfd89baa02a97fcb773067aef7794d6913374",
    "transactionIndex": "0x4"
  }
}
```

```json Error
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "error": {
    "code": -32600,
    "message": "Invalid Request"
  }
}
```

</ResponseExample>
